metadata.title: CVE-2024-25262 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: texlive-bin commit c515e was discovered to contain heap buffer overflow viathe function ttfLoadHDMX:ttfdump. This vulnerability allows attackers tocause a Denial of Service (DoS) via supplying a crafted TTF file.

criterions.comment: texlive-bin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
